typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	EventId as string
}
source(output(
		Id as integer '000',
		title as string,
		description as string,
		SpeakerId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SessionsSource
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		title as string,
		description as string,
		SpeakerId as integer,
		ConferenceId as integer,
		OriginalId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SessionsDestination
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		Code as string,
		Name as string,
		TagLine as string,
		ProfilePicture as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SpeakersDestination
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ConferencesDestination
SessionsSource, SessionsDestination exists(SessionsSource@Id == OriginalId,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SessionExists
SessionExists, SpeakersDestination lookup(SpeakerId == Code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FindSpeakerId
FindSpeakerId derive(ConferenceId = $EventId) ~> Conference
Conference, ConferencesDestination lookup(ConferenceId == ConferencesDestination@code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FindConferences
FindConferences sink(input(
		Id as integer,
		title as string,
		description as string,
		SpeakerId as integer,
		ConferenceId as integer,
		OriginalId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		title,
		description,
		SpeakerId = SpeakersDestination@Id,
		ConferenceId = ConferencesDestination@Id,
		OriginalId = SessionsSource@Id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Saving
